content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
You won a million dollars! Click the link to claim your prize now!
We're here to help with your home service needs. Please provide your name if you'd like to schedule an appointment or receive information.
This number has been identified as spam. We will not be able to assist further. Have a good day.
reason: Customer identified as spammer due to repeated spam messages
